ClassDef.summary: Provides methods to manage a collection of objects.

Property.name: Count
Property.summary: Gets the number of elements contained in the instance.
Property.value: The number of elements contained in the instance.

summary.para: Gets a at the specified index.
In C#, this property is the indexer for the class.
